text: Alefoso Yalayalatabua (22 January 1977 â€“ 18 July 2020) was a Fijian rugby union player. He played as a prop. He played for Fiji Warriors. He was born in Suva, Fiji. Yalayalatabua was first capped for Fiji. He was in his country's squad at the 2007 Rugby World Cup finals, playing a single game. Yalayalatabua died on 18 July 2020, aged 43.Former Flying Fijian dies at 43 ==References== Category:1977 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Fijian rugby union players
title: Alefoso Yalayalatabua
